text: (tavada) “obage dharmayen allah apiva bera gattayin pasu, e desata api hærunahot niyata vasayenma api allah kerehi boruva nirmanaya kala aya bavata pat vannemu. apage deviyan vana allah adahas kalahot misa, api eyin midimatama nohæka. apage deviyange adhyapana dænuma siyalla vata karagena ætteya. allahvama api visvasa kalemu” (yayi pavasa, deviyanta) “apage deviyane!apatada apage janatavatada atare oba sadharana tinduvak denu. niyata vasayenma obama viniscaya dimehi itamat sresthavantaya” (yayida prarthana kaleya)
